title: Class explores cover crops in ag systems

tasks.task: University of Kentucky Horticulture Research Farm activities
subtasks: Observing and sampling cover crop mixture growth
Noting competition between cover crops (e.g., hairy vetch vs. tillage radish)
Identifying challenges in cover crop usage and adoption
Measuring soil health through microbial activity (soil your undies)
Participating in virtual discussions with other university students
Group collaboration on cover crop research exercises

tasks.task: Cover crop mixture planting and management
subtasks: Planting cover crop mixtures (e.g., sorghum-sudan grass, oilseed radish, hairy vetch)
Adjusting planting strategies based on observed competition (e.g., reducing certain crops)
Evaluating the success of different cover crop combinations

tasks.task: Educational greenhouse class activities
subtasks: Learning about cover crops' benefits and drawbacks
Understanding factors limiting cover crop adoption
Discussing long-term benefits of cover crops
Analyzing soil health and biological activity

tasks.task: Cover crop research methodology
subtasks: Collecting data on cover crop growth and competition
Conducting soil health assessments through decomposition experiments
Documenting results and group presentations

tasks.task: Agricultural education and research collaboration
subtasks: Partipating in a hybrid class with multiple universities
Engaging in virtual and in-person learning activities
Presenting research findings via Zoom discussions

tasks.task: Experiment planning and execution
subtasks: Designing cover crop mixture trials
Implementing soil health testing methods
Recording data and observations from field experiments

tasks.task: Soil management techniques
subtasks: Monitoring microbial activity in soil
Assessing decomposition rates of buried items (soil your undies)
Analyzing the results to improve soil health practices

tasks.task: Documenting and disseminating research findings
subtasks: Keeping records of all experimental data and observations
Facilitating group discussions and informal sharing of results
Preparing for potential publications or presentations
